ing: 2 (11.5 ounce) cans condensed bean with bacon soup
des: "This is a very simple, yet delicious, dip. Enjoy it with tortilla chips, crackers or veggies. Yet another slow cooker recipe to add to your collection!"
ins: Place the soup, seasoning mix, sour cream, and salsa in a slow cooker and mix together. Top with cheese and heat on low until cheese melts, about 1 hour.
